mapper.select: select * from account_his where account_his_id = #{accountHisId} and account_no = #{accountNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account_his (account_no, amount, third_no, account_his_type) VALUES (#{accountNo},#{amount},#{thirdNo},#{accountHisType})
mapper.update: UPDATE account_his set account_status = #{accountStatus},version = version + 1,before_balance = #{beforeBalance},after_balance = #{afterBalance} WHERE account_his_id = #{accountHisId} and version = #{version} and account_status = 100 and account_no = #{accountNo}
mapper.select: select * from account_his where third_no = #{thirdNo} and account_no = #{accountNo}
select group_concat(account_his_id) as accountHisIds,sum(amount) as sum from account_his where account_no = #{accountNo} and account_status = 100 and version = 0 and amount >0

select ifnull(sum(amount),0) as "totalAmount", count(1) as "totalCount" from account_his where account_no = #{accountNo} and complete_sett = 1 and allow_sett = 0 and date(create_time) <= date_add(#{collectDate}, INTERVAL -#{riskDay} DAY)
